name: google-chrome-dev
title: Google Chrome Dev
description: Search open tabs, bookmarks and history in Google Chrome Dev.
author: daniel_gabbay

commands.name: new-tab
commands.title: New Tab
commands.subtitle: Google Chrome Dev
commands.description: Open a new Google Chrome Dev tab.

commands.name: search-tab
commands.title: Search Tabs
commands.subtitle: Google Chrome Dev
commands.description: List all tabs and go to the selected.

commands.name: search-all
commands.title: Search All
commands.subtitle: Google Chrome Dev
commands.description: Search browser all tabs and history,bookmarks.

commands.name: open-current-in-guest
commands.title: Open Current Tab in Guest
commands.subtitle: Google Chrome Dev
commands.description: Open the current active tab's URL in a new Chrome Dev Guest window.

commands.name: toggle-devtools
commands.title: Toggle DevTools
commands.subtitle: Google Chrome Dev
commands.description: Toggle Developer Tools for the active tab in Chrome Dev.

commands.name: view-windows
commands.title: View Windows
commands.subtitle: Google Chrome Dev
commands.description: View all Chrome windows and their tabs. Focus windows or navigate to specific tabs.

tools.name: new-tab
tools.title: New Tab
tools.description: Open a blank new tab or a tab to a given website.

tools.name: new-window
tools.title: New Window
tools.description: Open a blank new window or a window to a given website.

tools.name: new-guest-window
tools.title: New Guest Window
tools.description: Open a blank new guest window or a guest window to a given website.

tools.name: open-current-in-guest
tools.title: Open Current Tab in Guest
tools.description: Open the current active tab's URL in a new Chrome Dev Guest window.

tools.name: search-bookmarks
tools.title: Search Bookmarks
tools.description: Search bookmarks for a given query.

tools.name: search-history
tools.title: Search History
tools.description: Search history for a given query.

tools.name: get-active-tab
tools.title: Get Active Tab
tools.description: Get the currently active tab in Chrome Dev (the tab you're currently viewing).

tools.name: toggle-devtools
tools.title: Toggle DevTools
tools.description: Toggle the Developer Tools (DevTools) for the active tab in Chrome Dev.

tools.name: search-tab
tools.title: Search Tabs
tools.description: Search all open tabs in Chrome Dev.

tools.name: view-windows
tools.title: View Windows
tools.description: View all Chrome Dev windows and their tabs.

ai.instructions: You are an expert Google Chrome Dev assistant. You have access to the following tools to help you perform tasks related to Google Chrome Dev. Use these tools to open new tabs or windows, search bookmarks and history, and manage profiles in Google Chrome Dev. Always choose the most appropriate tool for the task at hand and provide accurate responses based on the tool outputs.

evals.input: @google-chrome-dev open a new tab to raycast.com

expected.meetsCriteria: Opening a new tab to https://raycast.com

evals.input: @google-chrome-dev open a new window to raycast.com

expected.meetsCriteria: Opening a new window to https://raycast.com

evals.input: @google-chrome-dev open a new guest window to github.com

mocks.new-guest-window: New guest window opened to https://github.com

expected.meetsCriteria: Opening a new guest window to https://github.com

mocks.open-current-in-guest: Opened current tab URL in guest window

expected.meetsCriteria: Opens the current tab in a guest window

evals.input: @google-chrome-dev get all tabs open in my browser

expected.meetsCriteria: Lists all open tabs across all windows

preferences.description: Find the full path to the Google Chrome Dev Profile path via chrome://version/. If empty, the default profile will be used.
preferences.label: Profile
preferences.name: profilePath
preferences.title: Profile Path

preferences.description: Before enable this, you should enable 'View > Developer > Allow JavaScript from Apple Events' in every Chrome profile.
preferences.label: Extract the favicon from every open tab
preferences.name: useOriginalFavicon
preferences.title: Favicon

preferences.description: When 'Default(classic), the tab will be opened in the profile open, or topmost profile window if multiple windows are open. When 'Current Profile', the tab will be opened in the profile specified in the 'Profile' field. When 'Original Profile' it will open in original profile tab is sourced from
preferences.name: openTabInProfile
preferences.title: Open Tab In Profile

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
